IndexPage.title: WELCOME TO NEW FARAH HOTEL
IndexPage.description: a traditional hotel located in the souss region of agadir.

Contact.description: Fill in the form with your questions, comments and concerns, and  we will get right back to you.
Contact.infoDec: Have any Queries? Let us know. We will clear it for you at the best.
Contact.name: Your Name

NewsLetter.description: Just a 10-minute walk through the shopping area to Agadir’s beach, is New Farah Hotel. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a coffee shop, a shisha bar and a roof-top terrace with sea and mountain views.
NewsLetter.title: ALL GUEST ROOMS HAVE A VIEW AND RELAXATION FACILITIES
NewsLetter.decOne: A private balcony and an LCD TV feature in all of the accommodation at New Farah. Each is air-conditioned and also has a minibar. Some rooms have views and all family rooms have a kitchenette.
NewsLetter.decTwo: Guests can enjoy views of the mountains in the Sky Restaurant, which is located on the fifth floor and offers a buffet and international cuisine. Guests can also eat at the pool-side snack bar or sample a drink from the bar.
NewsLetter.decTree: Free internet access is available in public areas of the hotel. There is also a currency exchange service and a tour desk in the 24-hour reception. The Royal Tennis Club is 260 metres from the hotel.
